Interface ConsoleRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcConsoleRepository, JpaConsoleRepository
public interface ConsoleRepository
Repository interface for managing Console entities. Follows the repository pattern to abstract the data access operations.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<Console> findById(int id)
      Find a console by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the console ID
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the console if found, empty otherwise

    • save

      Console save(Console console)
      Save a new console or update an existing one.
      Parameters:
      console - the console to save
      Returns:
      the saved console

    • delete

      void delete(Console console)
      Delete a console.
      Parameters:
      console - the console to delete

    • deleteById

      boolean deleteById(int id)
      Delete a console by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the console to delete
      Returns:
      true if the console was deleted, false if not found

    • count

      long count()
      Count the total number of consoles.
      Returns:
      the total number of consoles

    • existsById

      boolean existsById(int id)
      Check if a console with the given ID exists.
      Parameters:
      id - the console ID
      Returns:
      true if the console exists, false otherwise

    • findAll

      Set<Console> findAll()
      Returns all consoles.
      Returns:
      a set of all consoles
